■Up to 12 portions can be lined
up in the 1/2 UHC tray.
■Up to 6 portions can be lined
up in the 1/3 UHC tray.

■To move the portions to the UHC
tray with a wire rack, put the
basket sideways and use tongs to
remove and place them.

■Don't mix new and old portions.
■Put the empty basket on top of
the vat to let the remaining
oil drop into it instead of
getting all over the floor.
